price: 一体、われら*は彼ら以前、（彼らより）家財も容色も上回る、どれだけの世代を滅ぼしてきたであろうか。
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu athāthan wari'yan
